decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to use efficient disruption spells and powerful reanimation effects to quickly put powerful creatures into play from the graveyard. The deck aims to control the game with countermagic and removal, while setting up its combo pieces with cards like Entomb and Reanimate. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize and Daze to disrupt the opponent's game plan, the deck can set up its game-winning combo and overwhelm the opponent with high-impact threats like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty.

The deck focuses on using "Show and Tell" and "Sneak Attack" to cheat massive creatures like Griselbrand and Emrakul onto the battlefield for a quick win. It also includes counterspells like Force of Will and Flusterstorm to protect the combo. Atraxa, Grand Unifier helps to find combo pieces and Stock Up allows for card draw and filtering. The mana base is designed to efficiently produce the necessary colors for the combo. The deck aims to surprise opponents with powerful creatures and overwhelming force to secure victory.

The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures while disrupting their game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. The deck aims to use cards like Kozilek's Command and Lotus Petal to ramp into its high-cost Eldrazi creatures quickly, utilizing lands like Ancient Tomb and Eye of Ugin to help cast them. By combining aggressive creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer with disruptive elements, the deck seeks to apply pressure and control the game until victory is achieved.

The main concept of this UR Aggro Legacy deck is to maintain a fast pace with aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Wasteland and Daze. The deck utilizes efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning to control the board, and has card advantage engines like Brainstorm and Mishra's Bauble to maintain consistency. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides additional card draw and filtering options, while cards like Murktide Regent and Cryoshatter offer powerful late-game threats and board control options.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize Cloudpost ramp cards in order to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures and Karn planeswalkers. By generating a large amount of colorless mana, the deck can play threats ahead of schedule and overwhelm the opponent. The combination of acceleration from cards like Cloudpost and Ancient Tomb, as well as disruption from Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer, allows the deck to control the game and dictate the pace. Additionally, the inclusion of versatile spells like Warping Wail and Ugin, Eye of the Storms provide flexibility and answers to a variety of situations.

The deck focuses on assembling the Cephalid Breakfast combo by using Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to mill the library, then using Dread Return to bring back Thassa's Oracle for a win condition. It includes various card draw and filtering spells like Ponder and Brainstorm, along with disruption in Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares. The deck also utilizes Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Urza's Saga to generate value and speed up the combo. The mana base includes fetch lands to fix colors and support the overall strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly summoning powerful Eldrazi creatures while disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. By using mana acceleration from cards like Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb, it aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and powerful threats. The Eldrazi creatures in this deck have abilities that can quickly end the game if left unchecked, making it a formidable force in the Legacy format.

The deck focuses on using cards like Entomb and Reanimate to quickly bring powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty onto the battlefield. It also includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. With card draw spells like Brainstorm and Ponder, as well as control elements like Daze and Wasteland, the deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures, while disrupting their game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively disrupt the opponent's mana base using cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void, while quickly deploying threats like Anje's Ravager, Laelia, the Blade Reforged, and Pyrogoyf to close out the game. The deck also includes cards like Soul-Guide Lantern and Shatterskull Smashing for additional utility and removal options. The synergy between these disruptive elements and powerful creatures creates a formidable aggressive strategy that aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan using a combination of counterspells, hand disruption, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers. It aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent by generating card advantage and maintaining card advantage. The deck also incorporates a toolbox of powerful creatures and spells to deal with a variety of threats and situations. Overall, the strategy revolves around using a combination of control elements to dictate the pace of the game and eventually overwhelm the opponent with its powerful and versatile spells.

This deck focuses on disruptive and aggressive plays with Death & Taxes strategy, utilizing a combination of creatures like Containment Priest, Skyclave Apparition, and Stoneforge Mystic to disrupt opponents while deploying threats like Solitude and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd to apply pressure. The inclusion of Aether Vial allows for efficient creature deployment while Thoughtseize helps disrupt opponents' game plans. The addition of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion adds extra value and flexibility to the deck. Overall, the deck aims to control the board while applying pressure to opponents in a Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. The key strategy is to use cards like Thoughtseize and Swords to Plowshares to disrupt the opponent's hand and board state, while utilizing Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play quickly. The deck also has a strong synergy between creature cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Skyclave Apparition to control the game and generate value. By efficiently managing resources and utilizing synergistic creature abilities, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize aggressive tactics with a focus on UR aggro strategy. The deck aims to control the board early with cards like Wasteland and Lightning Bolt, while also maintaining hand advantage with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. By applying pressure with efficient creatures like Murktide Regent and Dragon's Rage Channeler, the deck can quickly close out games. The inclusion of disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze allows the deck to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect its own threats.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly cast Cascade spells such as Crashing Footfalls and Violent Outburst to put powerful creatures onto the battlefield with little to no cost. The deck utilizes cards like Shardless Agent and Lórien Revealed to get extra value from Cascade triggers. With a mix of disruption spells like Force of Will and creatures like Brazen Borrower, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays while controlling the game tempo. The deck also includes mana acceleration with cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Elvish Spirit Guide to ensure consistent and fast Cascade triggers.

This deck focuses on quickly disrupting the opponent's mana base with cards like Magus of the Moon, Blood Moon, and Chalice of the Void, while deploying aggressive threats like Pyrogoyf and Fury to quickly close out the game. With efficient mana acceleration through Chrome Mox, Simian Spirit Guide, and Ancient Tomb, this deck aims to establish early control over the game and maintain pressure with powerful threats. The inclusion of cards like Sundering Eruption and The One Ring provide additional removal and late-game reach, making it difficult for opponents to stabilize.

The deck aims to quickly assemble a combo involving Cephalid Illusionist and Nomads en-Kor to mill the entire library and put Narcomoeba into the graveyard. This triggers Dread Return to bring back Thassa's Oracle, which will win the game as the library is empty. The deck utilizes various cards like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, along with protection spells like Force of Will and Daze to ensure the combo goes off smoothly and efficiently. The deck also includes some control elements like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending to deal with opposing threats.
